challenge.title: Step 83
challenge.description: To keep with the same color theme you have already been using (black and brown), change the color for when the link is visited to black and use brown for when the link is actually clicked.

tests.text: You should set the color property to black when the link is visited.
You should set the color property to brown when the link is active.
